articles.description: Controversial star Conor McGregor has warned UFC that more fighters will follow in the footsteps of Khamzat Chimaev after he was allowed to remain on the card despite failing to make weight.
articles.content:
Controversial star Conor McGregor has warned UFC that more fighters will follow in the footsteps of Khamzat Chimaev after he was allowed to remain on the card despite failing to make weight.
